column4: Question: Is there a set of ATI Drivers on the Repository? If so, what are they called?
sure, both open-source, and proprietary
names?
fglrx are the proprietary drivers.

depends on your needs.
check out https://wiki.ubuntu.com/BinaryDriverHowto
also: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BinaryDriverHowto/ATI

xine is another option
Which is better? I've personally never liked vlc
depends on your preference.
did you read the medibuntu info I sent you?
I added it already, and installed libdvdcss2
so what's the problem?
It doesn't play, as i mentioned ;), but i gatta go to bed. I've spent hours fighting linux tonight haha, cant take anymore
